author: EL_Mo
title: Useless
review: This set I got for $3 at a Goodwill. It is not a good set at all. The minifigures are useless because of their legs and hands. And it is almost impossible to make a basket the way it is designed. Although there are a few decent pieces in the set, I would only recommend this set to a serious sports junkie.

author: hustla187
title: Why Bad?
review: This is a set that is unique in many ways. Lego made its first street ball court and they did it right. You get two hoops, 3 basketballs, 4 minifigs that shoot, and the court itself. There is nothing wrong with this and deserves a 5.

author: Zapp_Brannigan
title: So Good...
review:
I got this set for my eighth birthday. When I opened the set, I stared in awe at the minifigures, they were a whole new design never seen or used before.

Pros:

-4 awesome players that can pick up, grab, and shoot
-Basketball net looks really cool, the backboard is a 1x6x5 pre-printed brick with a little NBA logo on the bottom left corner!
-Ends of the court are slightly banked to keep the ball in
-Fence keeps ball from going out of bounds
-Court entrance
-There's also a bench, not much use out of it though
-Comes with three basketballs

Cons:

-none

If you use the right amount of power and aim accurately, you can actually pass the ball right into the other player's hand! I also notice after many times of play, the springs in the players' legs will get stronger! Overall great set and if you see it you have to buy it!

author: buzzandwoody2000
title: Great!
review:
I love this set!
It is great and very fun to play with.
SO IF YOU SEE THIS SET BUY IT!
The best part of the set is that it has 2 hoops.
this is a great set!
pros
three basket balls
the minifigres
the hole set!
cons
none
thats it folks!
buzzandwoody2000

author: kcrmccoy
title: Solid Sports Set
review:
This set is all around perfect:

Pros:
-Cool Minifigs with cool heads.
-You can swap out guys with other basketball players (Obviously)
- Three Basketballs
-Looks pretty realistic
-Good for introducing your friends to legos
-Tons of playability

Cons:
-Ball only gets stuck once or twice.

Also:
-It's also fun to use a lego soccer ball to switch things up.

Worth your money. Buy it.
